AI Post Generator.title: Frontend Software Engineer
AI Post Generator.description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  Position DescriptionYou will be working with fellow software engineers focused on building out Tesla's internal tools that facilitate process management of the design, permitting, and installation of energy products and systems. This team is focused on building a stable and scalable platform that can be extended and configured for all Tesla Energy and Vehicle products that are sold and supported today, and any that will be introduced in the future. The goal of this role and team is to enable our internal employees with ways to track, standardize, automate, and ultimately optimize all steps taken on an energy installation job from start to finish.ResponsibilitiesDesign, develop and support applications and systems under the team‚Äôs scopeWrite clean, maintainable, performant, and well-tested code to implement new features and fix bugsWrite unit tests, integration tests, and work with QA to coordinate timely regression for new featuresMonitor live system metrics, respond to alerts, and troubleshoot production issuesInvestigate and understand existing system technical functionality and propose technical improvementsCollaborate with Product, Design, and Business stakeholders to plan and prioritize new feature developmentCommunicate changes in project estimates, dependencies, and blockers with affected stakeholders quicklyOwn feature development and projects through design, development, testing, and release to productionUnderstand and improve the scalability, maintainability, availability, and visibility of applicationsDocument newly implemented technologies and application functionalityRequirementsDegree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent experienceSolid understanding of fundamental web technologies such as HTTP, REST, AJAX and JSON. Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS and JavaScript / ES6, including DOM manipulation and the JS object modelSolid understanding of database principles, p...

AI Post Generator.title: Software Engineer
AI Post Generator.description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  About Cleartrip (Flipkart Group) Launched in July 2006, Cleartrip India Pvt Ltd. has emerged as India‚Äôs fastest-growing online travel technology company. In April 2021, Flipkart acquired 100% of Cleartrip‚Äôs shareholding, and subsequently Adani Enterprises acquired a significant minority stake in Cleartrip in October 2021. With an aggressive plan to emerge as a leading innovator in the industry, Cleartrip is on its way to building a differentiated value proposition for its customers looking for end-to-end travel solutions. With industry-first offerings such as ‚ÄòEzCancel, Flexifly, and TravelSafe‚Äô, Cleartrip has a clear vision to disrupt the OTA segment. Combining intuitive products with a customer-centric approach and a wide selection of flights and hotels, Cleartrip brings a unique selling point to market, offering convenience, choice, competitive prices, and exclusive content to its customers. Become a Cleartripper today!About The Role & Team The Software Development Engineer's core responsibilities include working on highly-maintainable and unit tested software components/systems that address real-world problems. You will be working in a fast-paced and agile work environment delivering quality solutions that have immediate business impact.What you‚Äôll do:You will assume complete ownership of the projects you deliver while collaborating with technical and non-technical stakeholders on all elements of the development process. You are expected to demonstrate good learnability and adopt technologies that help build large scale, performant, reliable and sustainable systems.What you‚Äôll need:Minimum 1 year experience‚Ä¢ Strong with analytical and problem-solving skills‚Ä¢ Good understanding of data structures & algorithms with space & time complexities‚Ä¢ Good with Java programming language with knowledge on design patterns‚Ä¢ Preferably experience in building applications using java spring boot framework...

AI Post Generator.description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  Python Developer Intern (Paid) ‚Äì WebBoost Solutions by UMLocation: RemoteDuration: 3 monthsOpportunity: Full-time based on performance, with a Certificate of InternshipApplication Deadline: 06th August 2025About UsWebBoost Solutions by UM offers students hands-on experience, professional training, and career-building opportunities in software development.Role OverviewJoin us as a Python Developer Intern to enhance your coding skills, work on real-world projects, and gain practical software development experience.Responsibilities‚úÖ Develop, test, and debug Python applications.‚úÖ Collaborate on software projects and API integrations.‚úÖ Learn and apply Python frameworks like Django/Flask.Qualificationsüéì Enrolled in/completed a Computer Science or related program.üêç Proficient in Python programming.üåê Familiar with web frameworks (Django/Flask).üß© Strong problem-solving and time-management skills.Perksüí∞ Stipend: ‚Çπ7,500 - ‚Çπ15,000 (Performance-Based) (Paid)‚úî Certificate & Letter of Recommendation.‚úî Real-world project experience for your portfolio.How to Applyüì© Submit your application with the subject: "Python Developer Intern Application".Equal OpportunityWe welcome applicants from all backgrounds!

Faculty Performance Monitor.description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  üö® We're Hiring! | 2 Faculty Positions ‚Äì Robotics & AI Department üìç Location: Bangalore üïí Experience: 8+ Yearsüîç Eligibility Criteriaüìå Ph.D. / M.Tech in Robotics üìå Minimum 8+ years of experience üìå Strong research background with a flair for Artificial Intelligence (AI)üéØ Responsibilities‚úÖ Deliver lectures and practical sessions in Robotics & AI ‚úÖ Guide students in academic projects and research ‚úÖ Publish in reputed journals ‚úÖ Collaborate with industry and R&D teams ‚úÖ Contribute to curriculum and innovation

Faculty Performance Monitor.title: Assistant Professor - Computer Science Engineering
Faculty Performance Monitor.company: Chandigarh Group of Colleges, Landran, Punjab
Faculty Performance Monitor.description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  About the jobPosition: Assistant Professor ‚Äì CSELocation: CGC Landran, Mohali, PunjabType: Full-time | On-siteInstitution: Chandigarh Group of Colleges (CGC), LandranAbout Us:Chandigarh Group of Colleges (CGC), established in 2001, is a leading institution in professional education with over 13,000 students and 34+ programs. Known for academic excellence, research, and placements, CGC offers a vibrant teaching and learning environment.Role DescriptionThis is a full-time, on-site role for an Assistant Professor in Computer Science Engineering located in the Mohali district. The Assistant Professor will be responsible for developing and delivering high-quality coursework, mentoring students, conducting research, and participating in academic committees. Additional duties include curriculum development, student assessments, and contributing to the continuous improvement of the department's academic programs.Eligibility Criteria:Qualification:      M.Tech in CSE (Mandatory)Ph.D. in CSE (preferred or as per UGC/AICTE norms)
Experience:      Minimum 0‚Äì3 years of teaching or industry experience (freshers with strong academic background can also apply)
Skills:      Excellent communication and presentation skillsResearch aptitude and interest in publicationTechnically sound with proficiency in relevant tools and programming languages
Compensation:As per norms and experience. Salary is negotiable for deserving candidates.How to Apply:Interested candidates can share their updated CV to vidhu.hr@cgc.edu.in with the subject line "Application for Assistant Professor ‚Äì CSE"
Faculty Performance Monitor.requirements: M.Tech in CSE (Mandatory)Ph.D. in CSE (preferred or as per UGC/AICTE norms)

Faculty Performance Monitor.title: Faculty ‚Äì AI Tools & Applications for High Schoolers
Faculty Performance Monitor.description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  üåü Job Opportunity at PhysicsWallah üåüPosition: Faculty ‚Äì AI Tools & Applications for High SchoolersLocation: Full-time | Bangalore (Studio-based + Online Delivery)Mode: In-studio Recording & Online TeachingDemo Video Submission: Mandatory for ShortlistingAbout the ProgramWe're launching an innovative and engaging AI Tools & Applications course tailored for high school students (Grades 10‚Äì12). This program introduces learners to the power of AI through hands-on experiences with tools like ChatGPT, Gemini, Canva, Suno.ai, and Google Teachable Machine‚Äîno coding experience required!Role OverviewWe are looking for an enthusiastic and student-centric AI Tools Faculty to lead this foundational AI course. The ideal candidate should have experience with generative AI tools, a passion for education, and the ability to translate technical concepts into relatable, real-world applications.Key Responsibilit      iesDeliver 18 instructor-led sessions (3 hours each) combining teaching, interaction, and doubt resolution.Teach use cases of tools such as ChatGPT, Gemini, Canva, Teachable Machine, and Suno.ai.Simplify core AI concepts (e.g., Machine Learning, NLP, Classification) using analogies and visual aids.Guide students in using AI tools for tasks like:Text summarization and doubt clarificationFlashcard and storyboard creationAI-powered music and visual content generationNo-code web/app creationEncourage responsible AI use, touching upon ethics, bias, and misinformation.Assess and provide feedback on student capstone projects.Maintain high engagement and curiosity throughout the sessions.Share weekly updates and reports with the program coordinat

Employee Management System.title: Software Development Engineer - I
Employee Management System.description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  About Us:Airtel Payments Bank, India's first payments bank is a completely digital and paperless bank. The bank aims to take basic banking services to the doorstep of every Indian by leveraging Airtel's vast retail network in a quick and efficient manner. At Airtel Payments Bank, we‚Äôre transforming the way banking operates in the country. Our core business is banking and we‚Äôve set out to serve each unbanked and underserved Indian. Our products and technology aim to take basic banking services to the doorstep of every Indian. We are a fun-loving, energetic and fast growing company that breathes innovation. We encourage our people to push boundaries and evolve from skilled professionals of today to risk-taking entrepreneurs of tomorrow. We hire people from every realm and offer them opportunities that encourage individual and professional growth. We are always looking for people who are thinkers & doers; people with passion, curiosity & conviction; people who are eager to break away from conventional roles and do 'jobs never done before‚Äô.Purpose of the Job: The Developer will be part of a cross-functional Scrum team responsible for designing, developing, and testing diverse features of Airtel Payments Bank agile stream. Payments bank values software engineers who are motivated, creative, passionate and positive. You must be comfortable working closely with others and have solid communication skills. Software engineers who learn quickly and have strong technical skills will thrive at Airtel Payments Bank. You must have considerable experience with object oriented programming and should be familiar with design patterns, data structures, database and other staples of practical software development. Key Deliverables : ÔÇ∑ Research, design, implement and managing software programs. ÔÇ∑ Test and evaluate new programs ÔÇ∑ Identify the areas for modification in existing programs and subsequently developing ...
